thread.title_full: Chicago Cubs-Pittsburgh Pirates MLB wild card game: What TV channel, start time, how to watch live stream online | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Chicago Cubs-Pittsburgh Pirates MLB wild card game: What TV channel, start time, how to watch live stream online
text:
UPDATE : We have live updates and analysis from each inning for the Chicago Cubs-Pittsburgh Pirates NL wild card game. Follow along .
The Pittsburgh Pirates will host the Chicago Cubs on Wednesday in the National League wild card game. The winner moves on to face the St. Louis Cardinals in a best-of-five Division Series beginning Friday in St. Louis.
Cubs-Pirates: 5 storylines, who will win Here are details on how to watch the NL wild card game, including TV channel and live stream information.
What: Chicago Cubs (97-65) at Pittsburgh Pirates (98-64)
Where: PNC Park, Pittsburgh
When: Wednesday, October 7, at 5:08 p.m. PT/8:08 p.m. ET
What TV channel: TV on TBS, radio on KMTT (910 AM) in Portland area
Watch and listen online: Watch a live stream on TBS.com or on their app. Listen at ESPNRadio.com
Season series: Cubs won 11-8
Pitching matchup: Pittsburgh's Gerrit Cole (19-8, 2.60 ERA) vs. Chicago's Jake Arrieta (22-6, 1.77 ERA)
Playoff schedule: Bookmark our MLB scoreboard for postseason scores and schedules.
